Information for Authorities

Procedural Notes:

This file provides summary guidance for country authorities proposing to undertake a 'fiscal transparency ROSC' (fiscal transparency module of Reports on the Observance of Standards and Codes).

  • Arabic
  • Chinese
  • English
  • French
  • Portuguese
  • Russian
  • Spanish

Questionnaire on Fiscal Institutions:

This file contains a questionnaire designed to gather basic information on fiscal institutions and practices. Country authorities complete the questionnaire as the first stage in undertaking a 'fiscal ROSC'. The questionnaire can also form the basis for a self-assessment of a country's fiscal management system in relation to the fiscal transparency code.

Questionnaires on Resource Revenue:

Resource Revenue Questionnaire-Central Government: This file contains a questionnaire that has been designed to gather information on transparency aspects of the central government's management of natural resource revenues. It is completed by authorities in countries with significant natural resource revenues during the first stage of a 'fiscal transparency ROSC'.

Resource Revenue Questionnaire-National Resource Companies: This file contains a questionnaire that has been designed to gather information about transparency aspects of the role of a national resource company in the management of natural resource revenues. It is completed by such companies in countries with significant natural resource revenues during the first stage of a 'fiscal transparency ROSC'.
